abstract.p: A trading system is described herein for hosting a collection of one or more electronic exchanges. The collection of electronic exchanges may be made up of separately designated exchanges under one or more authorizing and regulating bodies. The trading system receives from traders bids to purchase and offers to sell a tradeable object listed at one of the electronic exchanges. Then, the trading system directs the bids and offers to the appropriate exchange where the bids and offers may be automatically matched in the corresponding market. The trading system may also be used to take actions in one or more markets that are internal and external to the trading system on behalf of a trader using preprogrammed trading instructions.

nplcit.text: No further relevant documents disclosed

The trading system may also be used to take actions in one or more markets that are internal and external to the trading system on behalf of a trader using preprogrammed trading instructions.

The trading system receives from traders bids to purchase and offers to sell a tradeable object listed at one of the electronic exchanges. Then, the trading system directs the bids and offers to the appropriate exchange where the bids and offers may be automatically matched in the corresponding market. The trading system may also be used to take actions in one or more markets that are internal and external to the trading system on behalf of a trader using preprogrammed trading instructions.

L'invention concerne un système commercial destiné à héberger un ensemble d'un ou de plusieurs échanges électroniques. Cet ensemble d'échanges électroniques peut être constitué d'échanges conçus séparément et contrôlés par un ou plusieurs organismes d'autorisation et de réglementation. Ce système commercial reçoit des négociants des demandes d'achat et des offres de vente d'un objet négociable coté dans l'un des échanges électroniques. Le système commercial oriente les demandes et les offres vers l'échange approprié, les demandes et les offres pouvant être mises en correspondance automatiquement dans le marché correspondant. Ce système commercial peut également permettre d'agir dans un ou plusieurs marchés internes et externes au système commerciale pour le compte d'un négociant, au moyen d'instructions commerciales préprogrammées.

The trading system may also be used to take actions in one or more markets that are internal and external to the trading system on behalf of a trader using preprogrammed trading instructions.
